Class Graph

Base class for different Graphs.

[Serializable]

LerpOverlap

Overlap ratio of LerpRatio. Value of 0 causes LerpRatio to animate data one by one. Value of 1 causes LerpRatio to animate data at the same time.

Declaration
public float LerpOverlap { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Single

LerpRatio

Float between 0 and 1, which controls the animation of data from 0 to value.
